title: MCTS Web
description: Play board games against a general game playing AI (Monte Carlo Tree Search).
technical: Runs entirely in the browser, using my own MCTS NPM package. So far I've implemented Tic-Tac-Toe, Onitama, and Filler.

title: Nth Visitor
technical: Serverless code running on AWS Lambda behind API Gateway, with DynamoDB for storage.

title: Prayer Banner
description: Reserve time slots to pray for an event. Made for a nonprofit I support, used by communities nationwide.
technical: Hosted on Amazon EC2 from 2021 to 2024.

title: Hexachromix
description: I designed a board game with a novel mechanic. Play against the AI or invite a friend. I'm proud of this one.
technical: Running on a Raspberry Pi at my house (sometimes needs a reboot).

title: Dotfile Management
description: My homegrown solution for syncing my settings across environments.
technical: Bash script installs latest dotfiles and backs up existing ones. Settings for vim, git, zsh, tmux.

title: TV Programs
description: This site, a showcase of my creative endeavors over the years.

title: Taylored Scales
description: Build or select a scale and see it on a guitar and piano. Explore its chords, modes, and more.

title: Mo Gold, Mo Dragons
description: My entry for Ludum Dare 40. The theme was "the more you have, the worse it is." I made the game, art (such as it is), and music in 48 hours.
technical: Uses steering behaviors and other concepts from my Boids project.

title: Umbra
description: Collect mushrooms while avoiding the sun's deadly flare. This is my first "game".
technical: I tried to export a web version, but the lighting effects (the core game mechanic) were too heavy.

title: Boids
description: Steering behavior-based flocking simulation using the boids algorithm.
technical: Made with HTML Canvas and vanilla JS.

title: Gear Font
description: Type something and click start. This is the first project I ever published online.
technical: Made with HTML Canvas and vanilla JS.
